Posts.Content: Truly amazing , you must be ecstatic- you can breath again . Hope all goes well with future treatment . Let us know how you do . Take care xx
Posts.Title: Pretty good news Julesxx

Posts.Content: Hi , I’m also uk in Scotland always happy to help and support people who join this journey. I was diagnosed in June , her neg and eostrogen pos I’m am so greatful for all the help and advice on this site. Happy to message as a friend too. I’m on let and imbrance and so far it’s keeping things at bay . Just take each day at a time . I’ve found McMillan are amazing support . Take care xx
Posts.Title: Depression and breast cancer

Posts.Content: I’m so sorry to read this news , I hope you get a plan put inplace for her soon . Sending lots of love x
Posts.Title: Turn for the worse
